root.message: All metadata fields for the indicator 16-b-1, translated into en
root.data: Goal 16. Promote the emergence of peaceful and inclusive societies for sustainable development, ensure access to justice for all and build, at all levels, effective, accountable and inclusive institutions16.b Promote and enforce non-discriminatory laws and policies for sustainable development16.b.1 Proportion of the population who reported having personally experienced discrimination or harassment in the previous 12 months on grounds prohibited by international human rights lawcategory IIICategory III
